james earl jones and adrian lester in Act 2  of Cat on a Hot Tin Roof are spontaneous and passionate. should be filmed.
Exciting run of act 1. Now off to see other actors working in the west end - cat on a hot tin roof.
There's another week to go. Glad the snow has gone in London
column4: as it can impede theatre-goers.

text: The amazing Godot scenery is up at the Theatre Royal Haymarket again and it feels like home.
After Godot rehearsals I did my Five Minutes interview with Matthew Stadlen for BBC News website. If only all interviews were as short.
